short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download original (high resolution) image, video, reels, story and highlight for Instagram™ with one click, free and unlimited.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Downloader for Instagram™ is an extension to help you to download original image, video, reels, story and highlight for Instagram™ with one click, free and unlimited.

▣ You can download by using this extension:
● Image
● Video
● Story
● Highlights
● Reels

▣ The extension adds a download button to a suitable place on instagram interface. You can find the button;
● Under the image/video on homepage page.
● Top-right corner on story/highlight page.
● Hover image/video on profile detail page. 
● Under the comments on post/reels detail page.
● Right side of reels page.

▣ Besides; if you right click over any image/video, You will see a menu item "Download | Downloader for Instagram™". You can start downloading by clicking this menu item.

To see how you can download, please take a look the extension images and video.

▣ After installing, please reload all tabs for the extension to take effect. For issues/suggestions
